reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best moisturizer for extremely dry skin! Best winter season lotion!
reviews.reviewText: As someone who struggles with extremely dry skin, finding the right body lotion has been a game-changer, and La Roche-Posay Lipikar Balm AP+ Intense Repair Body Lotion is truly a lifesaver. This lotion goes above and beyond in providing intense hydration and repair for dry, irritated skin. From the moment I started using it, I noticed a significant improvement in the texture and moisture level of my skin. The rich, creamy formula absorbs quickly and deeply, leaving my skin feeling soft, supple, and nourished without any greasy residue.What sets this product apart is its effectiveness in addressing the needs of sensitive and dry skin. It's formulated with ingredients that soothe and replenish, making it suitable for even the most delicate skin types. Plus, it's fragrance-free, which is a huge plus for those with sensitivities to scents.The price point for this product is also incredibly reasonable considering the quality and effectiveness. A little goes a long way, so a single bottle lasts a while, making it a cost-effective investment in my skincare routine.As an Accutane patient, finding products that provide relief from dryness and sensitivity is crucial, and La Roche-Posay Lipikar Balm AP+ Intense Repair Body Lotion has become a staple in my regimen. It's a product I can rely on day in and day out to keep my skin healthy, hydrated, and comfortable. If you're struggling with dry, sensitive skin, I highly recommend giving this body lotion a try. It's a true powerhouse when it comes to intense repair and hydration, and it's been a game-changer for me on my skincare journey.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars the best moisturizer in the world
reviews.reviewText: I am delighted with this moisturizing cream, it works for the whole body but I decided to use it on my face. I don't know why it took me so long to do it. The results I have obtained after 2 weeks of use are incredible. My skin is totally hydrated and without irritation now that It's winter and it's going great for me. I hope it's the same in spring. I have oily and sensitive skin at the same time and this is by far the best moisturizing cream I've ever used. In relation to the price, I think it's very supportive and affordable for anyone. 400ml is enough. to cover several months in short super recommendedsoft textureit is not greasyhas an imperceptible smell

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good for face and body
reviews.reviewText: I really like this lotion and have been using as my face lotion for a while now. I have combination skin and I feel that it doesn't make my skin too oily but also works well to moisturize the dry areas. It's also good for use on the body, even though I don't use it that way. It's good for sensitive skin as it doesn't have any strong fragrances. The only complaint I have is that when it's almost used up, it's really hard to get the rest of the lotion out as it is pretty thick and sticks to the bottom. I might have to cut the bottle in half to get the rest of it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this, the wash, and an eye cream and it was my first time using this brand and oh my gosh where has this been my whole life?!! This is so moisturizing (but not greasy or gross) and soothing! I’ve recently developed very sensitive and reactive skin so even products I’ve used for years tend to cause problems- from a slight itchy feeling to full blown contact dermatitis rashes. I had been so frustrated trying to find something that not only doesn’t cause my skin to react but also moisturizes my dry winter ravaged skin but this is a winner! No itchiness, no redness, no sticky feeling AND it healed any flaky dry patches. I mainly use it on body and hands but it provides a nice “oomph” of moisture for my face when I need it. There’s no noticeable scent so it won’t interfere with perfume and it shouldn’t be a problem for people who are sensitive to scents!BOTTOM LINE: HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great for dry, itchy skin. Packaging needs rethinking.
reviews.reviewText: Okay, so I’ve been using this La Roche-Posay Lipikar Balm AP+ lotion on my super dry and itchy legs, and let me tell you, it’s a game-changer! It seriously soothes my skin and the itchiness is just gone. Plus, it doesn’t leave that greasy feeling, which I totally love.But, the bottle is kind of a nightmare. The cream is so thick that getting it out with the pump is like a mini workout session. I usually end up unscrewing the cap to get to the lotion, especially when it starts running low but still has a lot of product in it. It’s pretty annoying and feels like I’m wasting a bunch of it. I wish they’d just put it in a tube or a jar. That would make life so much easier.So, yeah, the lotion itself is awesome for dry, itchy skin, but they really need to rethink that bottle!
Otimo produto! Na primeira utilização ja é possivel sentir a pele muito mais hidratada
He probado otras cremas y me quedo con esta, hidrata súper bien, la uso para rostro y cuerpo. Me deja la piel hidratada pero no grasosa, la amo

This cream is absolutely amazing! I use it everyday with my 8 mo. He had eczema under his chin and a little bit on his chest. I tried every baby cream out there to treat eczema and nothing worked.I finally tried this moisturizer and it literally repaired my baby’s skin 🥺 so so happy I tried it!
Preis Leistung top. sehr gut verträglich . gerne wieder
